outOfBounds

public static final TaggedWord outOfBounds

priorMod

protected STPriorModel priorMod
An object containing a ConditionalProbabilityTable that can give a prior distribution over all known supertags given a POS-tagged word. Trained as a factored LM (presumably using SRILM).

Constructor Detail

STFex

public STFex()
Constructor with no prior model.

STFex

public STFex(STPriorModel priorMod)
Constructor with a prior model over supertags (to be used as a feature).

Method Detail

useMultiPOS

public void useMultiPOS(boolean trueOrFalse)
Pass in true to use multi-POS features, pass in false not to.

getFeatures

public Collection<Pair<String,Double>> getFeatures(Map<Integer,TaggedWord> sentence,
                                                   Integer wordIndex,
                                                   boolean training)
Extracts an ArrayList representing the contextual predicates (features) of a line of (tokenised) text (each String represents the predicates that fire for a word in the line). Each resulting String will have the form: cp1 cp2 ... cpK

Specified by:
getFeatures in interface FeatureExtractor
Parameters:
sentence - A List of feature bundles.
wordIndex - An int giving the location of the word to be tagged.
training - A boolean indicating whether we are extracting features for training (in which case we need the label too).
Returns:
A Collection> of real-valued feature activations for the word at index wordIndex

getSentenceFeatures

public List<Collection<Pair<String,Double>>> getSentenceFeatures(Map<Integer,TaggedWord> sentence,
                                                                 boolean training)
Description copied from interface: FeatureExtractor
Same as getFeatures, but for the whole sentence, returning a List of contextual features, in order, one per Word in sentence

Specified by:
getSentenceFeatures in interface FeatureExtractor

getFeatures

public Collection<Pair<String,Double>> getFeatures(Map<Integer,TaggedWord> sentence,
                                                   Integer wordIndex)
Specified by:
getFeatures in interface FeatureExtractor
Parameters:
sentence - A Map<Integer,Word> giving the (string-indexed) sentence of Words to be tagged.
wordIndex - An Integer, giving the string index of the current word.
Returns:
A Collection<Pair<String,Double>><String> representing the real-valued activations of features (predicates) in the context of a word to be labelled.

getSentenceFeatures

public List<Collection<Pair<String,Double>>> getSentenceFeatures(Map<Integer,TaggedWord> sentence)
Description copied from interface: FeatureExtractor
Same as getFeatures, but for the whole sentence, returning a List of contextual features, in order, one per Word in sentence

Specified by:
getSentenceFeatures in interface FeatureExtractor
